= Introduction =

darwiinremoteOSC is using the wiiremote framework which is available at sourceforge <a href="http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=183966" target="_blank">here</a>. to use the framework with the provided xcode project, put the framework into the folder ../../libs/frameworks (starting from your xcode project file).
